docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 30 (AP)--The Treasury Department ruled tentatively today that seven countries were illegally subsidizing shipments of textile mill products and men's and boys clothing to this country.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 30 (AP)--The Treasury Department ruled tentatively today that seven countries were illegally subsidizing shipments of textile mill products and men's and boys clothing to this country.
docs.abstract: Treas Dept rules tentatively that 7 countries are illegally subsidizing shipments of textile mill products and men's and boys clothing to US; acted in response to petition filed by ACTWU; countries are Argentina, Brazil, Colombia, India, Taiwan, Philippines and Uruguay (S)

docs.snippet: You have the unprecedented opportunity to acquire a collection of world coins unlike any that has ever been issued before. A collection that includes official monetary coins from the coin-issuing nations of the  world--with each coin sealed in its...
docs.lead_paragraph: You have the unprecedented opportunity to acquire a collection of world coins unlike any that has ever been issued before. A collection that includes official monetary coins from the coin-issuing nations of the world--with each coin sealed in its own individual cachet, postmarked in the country of issue.

headline.main: Coins of all Nations; By arrangement with government officials throughout the world Fascinating coins from distant lands Assured rarity for your collection An educational and cultural adventure Custom-designed albums provided Assured rarity for your collection An educational and cultural adventure Subscription deadline: June 30, 1978

docs.snippet: PARIS, June 7 (AP)--Guillermo Vilas of Argentina survived a challenge today from Chile's Hans Gildemeister, 6-4, 2-6, 6-1, 3-6, 6-3, and moved into the semifinals of the $400,000 French open tennis championships.
docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS, June 7 (AP)--Guillermo Vilas of Argentina survived a challenge today from Chile's Hans Gildemeister, 6-4, 2-6, 6-1, 3-6, 6-3, and moved into the semifinals of the $400,000 French open tennis championships.

headline.main: Stockton, Vilas Gain Semifinals; Connors More Confident

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, June 11--Brazil defeated Austria, 1-0, in a tense match in the World Cup soccer championship today and both advanced to the second round. Peru also advanced as did the Netherlands, despite a 3-2 defeat by Scotland.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, June 11--Brazil defeated Austria, 1-0, in a tense match in the World Cup soccer championship today and both advanced to the second round. Peru also advanced as did the Netherlands, despite a 3-2 defeat by Scotland.

headline.main: Brazil Wins in Soccer; Brazil Tops Austria in Soccer, 1-0 Holes in Playing Field Contradiction in Rules

byline.original: By DAVID HUME Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: MINEOLA, L.I., June 16--The Nassau County District Attorney was restrained today from interfering with the sale of a horse, which he contends is the Uruguayan champion, Cinzano, at an auction to be held at Belmont Park on July 10.
docs.lead_paragraph: MINEOLA, L.I., June 16--The Nassau County District Attorney was restrained today from interfering with the sale of a horse, which he contends is the Uruguayan champion, Cinzano, at an auction to be held at Belmont Park on July 10.
docs.abstract: NYS Sup Ct (Mineola) Justice Douglas F Young restrains Nassau County Dist Atty Denis Dillon from interfering with sale of horse believed to be Cinzano at auction to be held at Belmont Pk on July 10; under agreement worked out between Dillon and horse's registered owner Jack Morgan," Morgan will be permitted to sell horse but horse must be made available as evidence in trial of Dr Mark Gerard, accused of running Cinzano under name of Lebon; case revd (M)

headline.main: Court Refuses to Block Auction of 'Ringer' Horse; At Undiclosed Location Effort Was Unsuccessful Yashchenko Betters Record
